database.name: VIEW GSR_GRNREGISTER_V
database.view: SELECT DISTINCT get_uuid() AS gsr_grnregister_v_id, mi.ad_org_id, mi.ad_client_id, mi.isactive, mi.created, mi.createdby, mi.updated, mi.updatedby, cbp.value AS bpcode, cbp.name AS bpname, mp.value AS pcode, mp.name AS pname, uom.name AS uom, co.documentno AS po, date(mi.movementdate) AS grndate, mi.documentno AS grn, date(co.dateordered) AS podate, ml.movementqty AS moveqty, col.qtyordered AS orderqty, col.priceactual AS price, col.linenetamt AS subtotal, org.name AS org, COALESCE(to_char(mi.em_gsr_gateentryno), 'NA') AS em_gsr_gateentryno FROM m_inoutline ml LEFT JOIN m_inout mi ON mi.m_inout_id = ml.m_inout_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner cbp ON cbp.c_bpartner_id = mi.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN m_product mp ON mp.m_product_id = ml.m_product_id LEFT JOIN c_uom uom ON uom.c_uom_id = mp.c_uom_id LEFT JOIN c_orderline col ON col.c_orderline_id = ml.c_orderline_id LEFT JOIN c_order co ON co.c_order_id = col.c_order_id LEFT JOIN ad_org org ON org.ad_org_id = mi.ad_org_id WHERE mi.issotrx = 'N' ORDER BY mi.documentno
